title: Banana production
owidProcessingLevel: Processed and adapted by Our World in Data
subtitle: Annual total production-based emissions of carbon dioxide (CO₂), excluding land-use change, measured in tonnes per person. This is based on territorial emissions, which do not account for emissions embedded in traded goods.

descriptionFromSource.title: How does the Poverty and Inequality Platform (PIP) describe this metric?
